Title: 39621 - # Reasons Amateur Photographers Should Consider Upgrading Their Camera
Direction: 675 Words. List 4-8 reasons that an amateur photographer should consider upgrading their camera. Many amateur photographers are still stuck with their cellphones or outdated point and shoot cameras. Explain to them why and how a new digital camera could help them take their photography to the next level. You can discuss different and more advanced setting options, available accessories, interchangeable lenses and editing software that are available for new digital cameras. Your target audience is amateur photographers. You can place your target URL in a section where you mention why upgrading their camera is a good idea and its benefits. Make sure to include at least 2 links to non-competitor products throughout the article.
Extra Writer Notes: Example AT: upgrade your digital camera

Title: 39623 - # Must Have Gadgets of 2016
Direction: 675 Words. List 4-8 different must-have gadgets of 2016. Talk about things like digital cameras, smartwatches, tablets, drones, etc. Make sure to include a wide variety of gadgets, from practical to extravagant. Discuss the features of these products and why they are considered "must-haves". Your target audience is people who are interested in technology and want to stay up to date on the latest devices/gadgets. You can place the client URL in the section discussing digital cameras and their features. Make sure to include at least 2 links to non-competitor products throughout the article.
Anchor Text: best digital camera branded term (brand/client name)
Extra Writer Notes: Example AT: get the best digital camera
